name: html-sign-language
description: This repository is a minimal, static demonstration of a **Sign Language Sidecar**: a 3D sign-language avatar that stays in view while users read long-form ICT accessibility content. The content focuses on how **EN 301 549 v3.2.1** is applied in **Canada** (CAN/ASC â€“ EN 301 549:2024) versus the **European Union** (Web Accessibility Directive / European Accessibility Act).
